articles.title: Not KL Rahul Or Shreyas Iyer, Ravi Shastri Picks Surprise No. 4 Batter For India At Asia Cup - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Ravi Shastri knows which India batter should play at No. 4 in the upcoming Asia Cup 2023.
articles.content: The No. 4 conundrum remains one India's biggest headaches, going into the Asia Cup 2023. While KL Rahul and Shreyas Iyer are capable of delivering at the spot, they haven't played cricket for a long … [+3538 chars]
